subnotes.content: For preservation reasons, and because copies exist elsewhere, viewing of this film is restricted. See: Series 5c (Special Formats, Audiovisual and digital material), Box 287, Folder 3628 to view the DVD copy of this film.
A DVD copy exists. See: Series 5c (Special Formats, Audiovisual and digital material), Box 287, Folder 3628 to view the DVD copy of this film.

A series of films by James & Joyce Robertson.  

Filmed by James Robertson

Commentary by Joyce Robertson

"Young Children in Brief Separation" is a project supported by: The Grant Foundation, Inc. 

Tavistock Institute of Human Relations, London, 1971

notes.label: Preservation Treatment

wind: preservation  

digitization recommendation: recommend film for digitization

subnotes.content: Thomas, 2 years and 4 months, in fostercare setting for a duration of 10 days. Documentary footage of Thomas interacting with parents and fostercare providers during and immediately following this period.
